|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] ''’‘Cascade’’'' QCA9984 *Mini PCI Express 2.0 interface, JTAG/UART connector *2.4GHz max 20dBm output power (per chain), 5GHz max 19dBm output power (per chain), FCC/CE certified *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11an (1.73Gbps) *2x spatial streams (2SS) MIMO 160/80+80 MHz bandwidth support *4x spatial streams (4SS) Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO) *802.11ac explicit transmit beamforming (TxBF) and legacy implicit :TxBF for both beamformer and beamformee *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), :Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), Space Time Block Code (STBC), :Low-Density Parity Check (LDPC) Codes *Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) *Supports IEEE 802.11d,e,h,i,j,k,r,u,v time stamp, w and z standards *Designed for High Bandwidth Enterprise Wireless Access Points
==Links of Interest== ===Purchase Sample=== [https://www.shop.compex.com.sg/product-page/wle1216vx Compex System Sample Store]
